From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To enable password parameters as the last resort without specifying the local enable password if no TACACS servers respond, use the **enable last-resort** command in global configuration mode. To disable the password parameters, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: Enables password parameters by specifying the local enable password.
Enables password parameters without specifying the local enable password.

Examples: The following example shows how to enable password parameters as the last resort without specifying the local enable password if no TACACS servers respond:

RelatedCmds.description: Displays statistics for a TACACS+ server.
